languages.text: "Я начал рассылать шпионов и убийц. Мои глаза и уши проникли на твое судно. Проникли в ваши города. И отыскали нити, что вели на один из твоих миров. Нити, сошедшиеся на обожженном мон-кай — источнике информации о том, где и когда нанесет удар мой кабал. Небольшой фокус с отвлечением тебя от планеты..." {n}Маражай взмахивает ладонью.{/n} "...и твой маленький информатор оказался в моих умелых руках".

traits.locale_text: "Я начал рассылать шпионов и убийц. Мои глаза и уши проникли на твое судно. Проникли в ваши города. И отыскали нити, что вели на один из твоих миров. Нити, сошедшиеся на обожженном мон-кай — источнике информации о том, где и когда нанесет удар мой кабал. Оставалось нанести один точный удар..." {n}Маражай рубит рукой воздух.{/n} "...и твой маленький информатор оказался в моих умелых руках, способных извлекать самые потаенные секреты из самых стойких умов".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."
languages.original_text: "Я начал рассылать шпионов и убийц. Мои глаза и уши проникли на твое судно. Проникли в ваши города. И отыскали нити, что вели на один из твоих миров. Нити, сошедшиеся на обожженном мон-кай — источнике информации о том, где и когда нанесет удар мой кабал. Небольшой фокус с отвлечением тебя от планеты..." {n}Маражай взмахивает ладонью.{/n} "...и твой маленький информатор оказался в моих умелых руках".

A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

traits.locale_text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Empecé por enviar espías y asesinos. Mis ojos y oídos infiltraron tu nave y tus ciudades y descubrieron un rastro que llevaba a uno de tus mundos. El rastro terminaba en un mon-keigh quemado, el origen de la información sobre dónde y cuándo mi Kábala planeaba atacar. Una pequeña artimaña para alejarte del planeta...». {n}Marazhai hace un arco con la mano.{/n} «... y el pequeño soplón cayó en mis manos».
languages.original_text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

traits.locale_text: «Empecé por enviar espías y asesinos. Mis ojos y oídos infiltraron tu nave y tus ciudades y descubrieron un rastro que llevaba a uno de tus mundos. El rastro terminaba en un mon-keigh quemado, el origen de la información sobre dónde y cuándo mi Kábala planeaba atacar. Una pequeña artimaña para alejarte del planeta...» {n}Marazhai hace un arco con la mano.{/n} «... y el pequeño soplón cayó en mis manos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “于是我派出了间谍和刺客，我的耳目渗透到了你的飞船与城市之中，他们发现了一条道路，可以通往你麾下的其中一个世界。而那条道路的终点，是一只被烧坏了脸的猴子，我的阴谋团所有具体的袭击的计划，都是那个猴子泄露出去的。于是我耍了一点点小把戏，把你从那颗行星上引走了……”{n}玛拉斋挥了挥手{/n}“……而你那位小小的线人，也落到了我的手中。”
languages.original_text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

traits.locale_text: “于是我派出了间谍和刺客，我的耳目渗透到了你的飞船与城市之中，他们发现了一条道路，可以通往你麾下的其中一个世界。而那条道路的终点，是一只被烧坏了脸的猴子，我的阴谋团所有具体的袭击的计划，都是那个猴子泄露出去的。于是我耍了一点点小把戏，把你从那颗行星上引走了……”{n}玛拉斋挥了挥手{/n}“……而你那位小小的线人，也落到了我的手中。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺はスパイやアサシンを送り始めた。俺の目や耳がお前の船、都市に入り込み、惑星のひとつに続く痕跡を見つけた。火傷を負ったモン＝ケイで痕跡が途絶えた…陰謀団がいつどこを攻撃するかについての情報源だ。お前を惑星から引き離すためのちょっとした策だよ…」{n}マラズハイが手を振った。{/n}「…それから、お前のかわいい情報屋を捕まえたぞ」
languages.original_text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はスパイやアサシンを送り始めた。俺の目や耳がお前の船、都市に入り込み、惑星のひとつに続く痕跡を見つけた。火傷を負ったモン＝ケイで痕跡が途絶えた…陰謀団がいつどこを攻撃するかについての情報源だ。お前を惑星から引き離すためのちょっとした策だよ…」{n}マラズハイが手を振った。{/n}「…それから、お前のかわいい情報屋を捕まえたぞ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai aussitôt déployé mes espions et assassins. Mes yeux et mes oreilles ont infiltré votre vaisseau et vos villes, où ils ont découvert une piste menant à l'un de vos mondes. Une piste qui m'a conduit jusqu'à un mon-keigh brûlé, la source des fuites relatives aux plans d'attaque de ma Kabale. Il m'a alors suffi d'une petite ruse pour vous éloigner de la planète... {n}poursuit Marazhai en agitant la main,{/n} ... et votre petit mouchard m'est tombé tout cru dans le bec. »
languages.original_text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai aussitôt déployé mes espions et assassins. Mes yeux et mes oreilles ont infiltré votre vaisseau et vos villes, où ils ont découvert une piste menant à l'un de vos mondes. Une piste qui m'a conduit jusqu'à un mon-keigh brûlé, la source des fuites relatives aux plans d'attaque de ma Kabale. Il m'a alors suffi d'une petite ruse pour vous éloigner de la planète... {n}poursuit Marazhai en agitant la main,{/n} ... et votre petit mouchard m'est tombé tout cru dans le bec. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe begonnen, Spione und Assassinen auszuschicken. Meine Augen und Ohren haben Euer Schiff infiltriert, Eure Städte, und sie haben eine Spur entdeckt, die zurück zu einer Eurer Welten führte. Eine Spur, die bei einem verbrannten Chem-Pan-Sey endete — der Quelle der Informationen darüber, wo und wann meine Kabale zuschlagen würde. Ein kleiner Trick, um Euch von dem Planeten wegzulocken"{n}, Marazhai winkt mit der Hand,{/n} "und schon hatte ich Euren kleinen Informanten in meinen Klauen."
languages.original_text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe begonnen, Spione und Assassinen auszuschicken. Meine Augen und Ohren haben Euer Schiff infiltriert, Eure Städte, und sie haben eine Spur entdeckt, die zurück zu einer Eurer Welten führte. Eine Spur, die bei einem verbrannten Chem-Pan-Sey endete — der Quelle der Informationen darüber, wo und wann meine Kabale zuschlagen würde. Ein kleiner Trick, um Euch von dem Planeten wegzulocken"{n}, Marazhai winkt mit der Hand,{/n} "und schon hatte ich Euren kleinen Informanten in meinen Klauen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

languages.text: "Casuslar, suikastçılar yolladım. Geminde, şehirlerinde hep bir gözüm, bir kulağım oldu. Sonunda dünyalarından birine çıkan, bir ize rastladık. Ucunda yanık bir mon-keigh, yani Kabalımın ne zaman, nereye saldıracağını öğrendiğiniz kaynak olan ize. Ufak bir numarayla seni gezegenden uzaklaştırdım..." {n}Marazhai elini sallıyor.{/n} "Sonra da muhbiri kıskıvrak yakaladım."
languages.original_text: "I began sending out spies and assassins. My eyes and ears infiltrated your vessel, your cities, and they discovered a trail that led back to one of your worlds. A trail that ended with a burned mon-keigh — the source of the information about where and when my Kabal was going to strike. A little trickery to draw you away from the planet..." {n}Marazhai waves his hand.{/n} "...and I had your little informant in my grasp."

traits.locale_text: "Casuslar, suikastçılar yolladım. Geminde, şehirlerinde hep bir gözüm, bir kulağım oldu. Sonunda dünyalarından birine çıkan bir ize rastladık. Ucunda yanık bir mon-keigh olan ize... Kabalımın ne zaman, nereye saldıracağını öğrendiğiniz kaynağa. Ufak bir numarayla seni gezegenden uzaklaştırdım..." {n}Marazhai elini sallıyor.{/n} "...Ve de muhbiri kıskıvrak yakaladım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
